Welcome to techKoodaram

Learn.Build.Share.

Our Community

Four pillars of the koodaram

Everything we do revolves around these core values. They guide how we gather, how we grow, and how we lift each other up.

Learn

Workshops, study groups, and mentorship for every skill level. No question is too basic.

Share

Lightning talks, blog posts, and open discussions. Your unique perspective matters here.

Build

Hackathons, side projects, and collaborative experiments. Ideas become reality together.

Belong

A safe, inclusive space where you're welcomed as you are. No gatekeeping, just growth.

Get Involved

We are always looking for passionate individuals to join our mission.

Give a Talk

Share your knowledge and experience with the community.

Collaborate

Partner with us for college events and workshops.

Contribute

Help us build the tech ecosystem in our region.

Contact Us

Reach out for any other queries or suggestions.

Write to us at

contact@techkoodaram.in

Ready to enter the koodaram?

Join a community of curious minds from across towns from Sivakasi to Tenkasi. No fees, no barriers — just good people sharing good knowledge.

Building a tech ecosystem for

Sivakasi•Rajapalayam•Srivilliputhur•Sankarankovil•Kovilpatti•Tenkasi
